script.name: plugin.guilds.merchantnet
script.description: Guilds: Setup the Merchant uplink network
script.sourceplaintext:
$Guilds.Data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' skip if $Guilds.Data return null
$current.time = playing time $last.time = $Guilds.Data['merchant.sats.last'] if $last.time if ( $last.time + 7200 ) > $current.time return null end end
$Guilds.Data['merchant.sats.last'] = $current.time
$Guilds.Config = get global variable: name='guilds.config' $array.sats = $Guilds.Data['merchant.sats'] if not $array.sats $array.sats = array alloc: size=10 $Guilds.Data['merchant.sats'] = $array.sats end
@ $main.universe = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.getmainuniverse : $aSectors = $main.universe -> find all sectors within 100 jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE] $table.sectors = table alloc $i = size of array $aSectors while $i dec $i = $sector = $aSectors[$i] $sector.owner = $sector -> get owner race if $sector.owner == Argon OR $sector.owner == Boron OR $sector.owner == Split OR $sector.owner == Paranid OR $sector.owner == Teladi OR $sector.owner == Terran OR $sector.owner == ATF OR $sector.owner == Industritech OR $sector.owner == Privateer $table.sectors[$sector] = [TRUE] end end
$max.sats = 8 if $Guilds.Config $max.sats = $Guilds.Config['merchant.sats'] skip if $max.sats $max.sats = 8 end
$i = 0 while $i < 10 $table.sats = $array.sats[$i] if not $table.sats $table.sats = table alloc $array.sats[$i] = $table.sats end
inc $i =
$current.time = playing time
* check for timeout $key = get next key: table=$table.sats key=null while $key if $key -> exists $timeout = $key -> get local variable: name='merchant.sat.timeout' if $timeout > $current.time $key ->destruct: show no explosion=[FALSE] $s = $key $key = get next key: table=$table.sats key=$key remove key $s from table $table.sats continue end end $key = get next key: table=$table.sats key=$key end
* create any new sats $size = size of table $table.sats while $size < $max.sats skip if size of table $table.sectors break
$sector = get random key: table=$table.sectors gosub sub.CheckValidSector if $ret remove key $sector from table $table.sectors continue end $x = random value from -2000 to 2000 - 1 $z = random value from -2000 to 2000 - 1 $s = create ship: type=Merchant's Guild Uplink Relay owner=Guilds addto=$sector x=$x y=-30000 z=$z $s ->set owner race to Guilds $text = read text: page=[Page.ObjDesc] id=92283 $name = sprintf: fmt='(%s) %s', $i, $text, null, null, null $s ->set name to $name $s ->set override name id: 92283 $s ->set local variable: name='merchant.sat' value=$i
$rnd = random value from 36000 to 72000 - 1 $rnd = $current.time + $rnd $s ->set local variable: name='merchant.sat.timeout' value=$rnd $table.sats[$sector] = $s inc $size = end
* remove destroyed $key = get next key: table=$table.sats key=null while $key $s = $key $key = get next key: table=$table.sats key=$key
if not $s -> exists remove key $s from table $table.sats end end end
return null
sub.CheckValidSector: $ret = [FALSE] $s = find ship: sector=$sector class or type=Merchant's Guild Uplink Relay race=Guilds flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null if $s -> exists $ret = [TRUE] end endsub return null

sval.val: Guilds: Setup the Merchant uplink network
